import React from 'react'; import { makeStyles } from '@material-ui/core/styles'; import { Grid, Paper, Typography, Icon, Avatar, Divider } from '@material-ui/core'; import Background from './imgs/1x/background.png'; const useStyles = makeStyles(theme => ({ container: { backgroundImage: `url(${Background})`, backgroundSize: 'cover', height: '100vh', display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'flex-start', }, paper: { height: 500, width: '70%', marginTop: 80, padding: 30, display: 'flex', // justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', flexWrap: 'wrap', background: 'linear-gradient(45deg, rgba(253, 253, 253, 0.03) 0%, rgba(253, 253, 253, 0.03) 50%,rgba(64, 64, 64, 0.03) 50%, rgba(64, 64, 64, 0.03) 100%),linear-gradient(77deg, rgba(39, 39, 39, 0.01) 0%, rgba(39, 39, 39, 0.01) 50%,rgba(91, 91, 91, 0.01) 50%, rgba(91, 91, 91, 0.01) 100%),linear-gradient(311deg, rgba(19, 19, 19, 0.03) 0%, rgba(19, 19, 19, 0.03) 50%,rgba(214, 214, 214, 0.03) 50%, rgba(214, 214, 214, 0.03) 100%),linear-gradient(233deg, rgba(250, 250, 250, 0.03) 0%, rgba(250, 250, 250, 0.03) 50%,rgba(118, 118, 118, 0.03) 50%, rgba(118, 118, 118, 0.03) 100%),linear-gradient(227deg, rgba(216, 216, 216, 0.02) 0%, rgba(216, 216, 216, 0.02) 50%,rgba(69, 69, 69, 0.02) 50%, rgba(69, 69, 69, 0.02) 100%),linear-gradient(151deg, rgba(205, 205, 205, 0.02) 0%, rgba(205, 205, 205, 0.02) 50%,rgba(20, 20, 20, 0.02) 50%, rgba(20, 20, 20, 0.02) 100%),linear-gradient(7deg, rgba(169, 169, 169, 0.02) 0%, rgba(169, 169, 169, 0.02) 50%,rgba(231, 231, 231, 0.02) 50%, rgba(231, 231, 231, 0.02) 100%),linear-gradient(244deg, rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.01) 0%, rgba(204, 204, 204, 0.01) 50%,rgba(200, 200, 200, 0.01) 50%, rgba(200, 200, 200, 0.01) 100%),linear-gradient(45deg, rgb(185, 232, 75),rgb(37, 116, 27))', color: 'white' }, listContainer: { display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', }, terri: { }, contact: { position: 'relative', width: '60%', marginTop: 20, padding: 20, backgroundColor: 'rgb(255, 255, 255, 0.1)', display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', color: 'white' }, icons: { height: 50, width: 50, position: 'absolute', top: '50%', left: 20, transform: 'translate(0, -50%)', background: 'linear-gradient(252deg, rgba(69, 69, 69, 0.03) 0%, rgba(69, 69, 69, 0.03) 50%,rgba(47, 47, 47, 0.03) 50%, rgba(47, 47, 47, 0.03) 100%),linear-gradient(335deg, rgba(66, 66, 66, 0.09) 0%, rgba(66, 66, 66, 0.09) 50%,rgba(188, 188, 188, 0.09) 50%, rgba(188, 188, 188, 0.09) 100%),linear-gradient(223deg, rgba(194, 194, 194, 0.08) 0%, rgba(194, 194, 194, 0.08) 50%,rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08) 50%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08) 100%),linear-gradient(82deg, rgba(27, 27, 27, 0.01) 0%, rgba(27, 27, 27, 0.01) 50%,rgba(197, 197, 197, 0.01) 50%, rgba(197, 197, 197, 0.01) 100%),linear-gradient(281deg, rgba(3, 3, 3, 0.09) 0%, rgba(3, 3, 3, 0.09) 50%,rgba(198, 198, 198, 0.09) 50%, rgba(198, 198, 198, 0.09) 100%),linear-gradient(319deg, rgba(47, 47, 47, 0.01) 0%, rgba(47, 47, 47, 0.01) 50%,rgba(89, 89, 89, 0.01) 50%, rgba(89, 89, 89, 0.01) 100%),linear-gradient(278deg, rgba(243, 243, 243, 0.06) 0%, rgba(243, 243, 243, 0.06) 50%,rgba(63, 63, 63, 0.06) 50%, rgba(63, 63, 63, 0.06) 100%),linear-gradient(38deg, rgba(81, 81, 81, 0.09) 0%, rgba(81, 81, 81, 0.09) 50%,rgba(201, 201, 201, 0.09) 50%, rgba(201, 201, 201, 0.09) 100%),linear-gradient(33deg, rgba(168, 168, 168, 0.08) 0%, rgba(168, 168, 168, 0.08) 50%,rgba(129, 129, 129, 0.08) 50%, rgba(129, 129, 129, 0.08) 100%),linear-gradient(0deg, #1b9efe,#46f3e7)', }, ul: { perspective: 1000, position: 'relative', display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', flexWrap: 'wrap' }, li: { borderRadius: '4px', cursor: 'pointer', transform: 'rotateY(-30deg) rotateX(15deg) translate(-50%, 0%)', position: 'absolute', left: '50%', padding: '50px 100px', mixBlendMode: 'multiply', color: 'black', '&:nth-child(1)': { background: 'lightblue', top: -105, zIndex: 2, }, '&:nth-child(2)': { background: 'lightgreen', zIndex: 2, },'&:nth-child(3)': { background: 'lightyellow', top: 105, zIndex: 2, }, '&:hover': { transform: 'rotateY(-22deg) rotateX(7deg) scale(1.03)', transition: 'transform .4s ease-out', }, }, })); const Info = () => { const classes = useStyles(); return ( Terri Banner
  • local_phone Phone
  • email Email
  • calendar_today Calendar Availability
{/* local_phone 704.577.5028 email robogator@aol.com calendar_today Availability Calendar */} ); }; export default Info;
